articles.description: West Bromwich Albion pulled off a shock 5-2 Premier League win over Chelsea with Matheus Pereira and Callum Robinson both scoring twice following Thiago Silva’s sending off for Thomas Tuchel’s side
articles.content: Perhaps it was inevitable that Thomas Tuchels unbeaten start would end at the hands of Sam Allardyce. After introducing order during his first months at Chelsea, Tuchel watched everything come crashi… [+5117 chars]

articles.title: 'Turned the TV off in disgust': Shane Warne hammers St Kilda after 'unacceptable' showing against Essendon - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: 'I just turned the TV off in disgust'
articles.content:
Shane Warne has joined those piling on St Kilda after a disastrous showing against Essendon, admitting that he was forced to stop watching at one point.
Warne, like many St Kilda fans, was left stun… [+1299 chars]

articles.title: Roosters v Warriors: Radley returns; club debut for Montoya - NRL.COM
articles.description: Roosters v Warriors: The wounded Roosters certainly have a job on their hands to quell the high-spirited Warriors, who turned a 19-point deficit into a three-point win over the Raiders last week.
